questions.question: What is 3/4 + 1/4?
questions.subject: math
questions.explanation: When adding fractions with the same denominator, add the numerators: 3 + 1 = 4, so 4/4 = 1

questions.question: A triangle has three equal sides of 6 cm each. What is its perimeter?
questions.subject: math
questions.explanation: Perimeter of an equilateral triangle = 6 + 6 + 6 = 18 cm

questions.question: A square has sides of 7 cm. What is its area?
questions.subject: math
questions.explanation: Area of a square = side × side = 7 × 7 = 49 cm²

questions.question: A shop offers a 25% discount on a jacket priced at CHF 80. What is the discount amount?
questions.subject: math
questions.explanation: 25% of 80 = (25 ÷ 100) × 80 = 20, so the discount is CHF 20

questions.question: A rectangle has length 15 cm and perimeter 46 cm. What is its width?

questions.explanation: Perimeter = 2(l + w), so 46 = 2(15 + w), 23 = 15 + w, w = 8 cm
